thread.title: Delicious afternoon tea
thread.title_full: Delicious afternoon tea - Review of Covent Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jo F
title: Delicious afternoon tea
text: Fantastic location in the heart of London. Great if coming from the theatres/ shopping/ site-seeing. I came here for a afternoon tea with my mum. It is well priced starting from Â£27. Lux setting, lovely service. A calm oasis in London. Delicious tea would definitely recommend
